org.openjdk.tools.javac.util

类 Position.LineTabMapImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.javac.util.Position.LineTabMapImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.sun.source.tree.LineMap, Position.LineMap
    封闭类:
    Position

    public static class Position.LineTabMapImpl
extends Object
    A LineMap that handles tab expansion correctly. The cost is an additional bit per character in the source array.

      • getColumnNumber

        public int getColumnNumber(int pos)
        从接口复制的说明: Position.LineMap
        Find the column for a character position. Note: this method does not handle tab expansion. If tab expansion is needed, use a LineTabMap instead.
        指定者:
        getColumnNumber 在接口中 Position.LineMap
        参数:
        pos - character offset of the position
        返回:
        the column number at which pos occurs

      • getPosition

        public int getPosition(int line,
                       int column)
        从接口复制的说明: Position.LineMap
        Find the position corresponding to a (line,column).
        指定者:
        getPosition 在接口中 Position.LineMap
        参数:
        line - number of line (first is 1)
        column - number of character on line (first is 1)
        返回:
        position of character

      • getLineNumber

        public int getLineNumber(int pos)
        从接口复制的说明: Position.LineMap
        Find the line containing a position; a line termination character is on the line it terminates.
        指定者:
        getLineNumber 在接口中 Position.LineMap
        参数:

        返回:
        the line number on which pos occurs (first line is 1)
